org.ardenus.input.controller.wireless

Enum WirelessControllerType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WirelessControllerType>
      • org.ardenus.input.controller.wireless.WirelessControllerType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WirelessControllerType>

    public enum WirelessControllerType
extends java.lang.Enum<WirelessControllerType>
    Used to get the info needed in order to instantiate a controller based on it's GLFW joystick name.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static interface  WirelessControllerType.AxisComputation
      The base lambda interface class used as a way for the wireless controller type to compute code.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      PEGA
      An iPega™ controller.
      PLAYSTATION
      A Sony PlayStation 4™ controller.
      SWITCH
      A Nintendo Switch™ pro-controller.
      XBOX
      A Microsoft XBOX One™ or XBOX 360™ controller.

      • isAxisPressed

        public static boolean isAxisPressed(int jid)
        Checks if the specified joystick has pressed in any direction on the left analog X axis.
        Parameters:
        jid - the joystick ID.
        Returns:
        true if the specified controller is a known controller type and has pressed any directions on the left analog stick, false otherwise.
